General.Name: Doric Nimrod Air Three Ltd
General.Description: Doric Nimrod Air Three Limited engages in acquiring, leasing, and selling of aircraft in Guernsey. The company owns Airbus A380 aircraft. Doric Nimrod Air Three Limited was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Saint Peter Port, Guernsey.
General.Address: Dorey Court, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 2HT
